crt_updates.claim: Trust calibration methods vary widely, with algorithmic and user-centric approaches being most common.
crt_updates.source: Peer-reviewed studies on trust calibration techniques
crt_updates.reason: New evidence from systematic review highlights diverse methods.

crt_updates.claim: Effective trust calibration requires continuous monitoring and adjustment based on performance metrics.
crt_updates.source: Peer-reviewed studies on trust calibration techniques
crt_updates.reason: New evidence emphasizes the need for ongoing adjustments.

crt_updates.claim: Industry standards provide a framework for implementing trust calibration effectively.
crt_updates.source: Industry standards and guidelines for AI trustworthiness
crt_updates.reason: New evidence from official standards supports this claim.

crt_updates.claim: Ethical considerations must be integrated into trust calibration strategies.
crt_updates.source: Industry standards and guidelines for AI trustworthiness
crt_updates.reason: New evidence highlights the importance of ethics in trust calibration.

vault_notes.title: Trust Calibration Methods
vault_notes.content: Trust calibration methods vary widely, with algorithmic and user-centric approaches being most common. Effective trust calibration requires continuous monitoring and adjustment based on performance metrics.

vault_notes.title: Industry Standards for Trust Calibration
vault_notes.content: Industry standards provide a framework for implementing trust calibration effectively. Ethical considerations must be integrated into trust calibration strategies.
